"【不可解な行動】<br>仮テキスト": "Oh, what brings you here?"
"Casra of the Council of Six, why are you-?"

"Thanks for the greeting.
I'm here on a mission, just like you."
"But it's a rare sight to see you partied with anyone."
"Not to mention it's <%me>. This could be some act of fate."
"You know her?"
"Why are you here?"
"Not formally, we do tend to see each other occasionally on work related incidents."
"Nothing out of the ordinary. I'm just here on assignment from ARKS."
"But to jump right to the point, you two came here to confront the rampaging dragon, am I right?"
"It seems that there was a suspicious parameter in the sphere arena in the center of the city."
"Why would it be there?"
"Indeed, it seems odd."
"It seems that area is being used as a promotional stage for a certain idol."
"Not exactly a spot with a lot of Darkers, I find it completely baffling."
"<%me>, could it be that-"
"It wants to hear you sing?"
"Let's hurry."
"That could be a possibility. That's what I was doing when it appeared before."
"If we play a song in the sphere arena, we may be able to get it to stop for a period of time."
"A song?"
"It seems kind of poetic. But if it's <%me>'s idea, then it has merit."
"Very well, I will follow your lead on this one."

"It would make sense to head there,
as quickly as possible. Hurry."
"I owe you one Casra of the Council of Six."
"It seems that having you owe me a favor could come in handy sometime."
"Let's hurry. We cannot allow him to get away this time."
"While it's not much. Would allow me to accompany you?"
"You just want to keep tabs on me, don't you?"
"It seems you misjudge my intentions. Do you really think that's what I'm after?"
"Fine, do what you want."
"The Uncontrollable Beast"
"第９章 筋違いのカーテンコール"
"The First Divide"
"第９章 偶像のシュプレヒコール"
